bodydiv.p: The main changes from the IFRIC’s proposals in D25 are as follows:

li.p: Paragraph 3 was added because the IFRIC identified specific transactions that are outside of the scope of the Interpretation.
Paragraph 6 was modified to state that measurement should be based on the fair value of the equity instruments issued, unless that fair value cannot be reliably measured.

Paragraph 7 was added to reflect the modification to paragraph 6. It also clarifies the intention of the IFRIC that in measuring the fair value of a financial liability extinguished that includes a demand feature (eg a demand deposit), paragraph 49 of IAS 39 is not applied.
Paragraph 8 was added, and paragraph 10 was modified, to clarify how the Interpretation should be applied when only part of the financial liability is extinguished by the issue of equity instruments.
Paragraph 9 was modified to state when the equity instruments issued should be initially measured.
